blogPost.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
blogPost.body: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
blogPost.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.
blogPost.author: Olivier

localize.description: Niceboard是开始你自己的利基职位板业务的最简单的方式，而不需要编写一行代码。在几分钟内设置您的主板，连接您自己的域，查看实时应用程序统计信息，回填作业，翻译它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 创建一个求职公告板。不需要代码。

localize.description: Niceboard是開始你自己的利基職位板業務的最簡單的方式，而不需要編寫一行代碼。在幾分鐘內設置您的主板，連接您自己的域，查看實時應用程序統計信息，回填作業，翻譯它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 創建一個求職公告板。不需要代碼。

previous.excerpt: How colorful was your Instagram in 2020? Get an interactive report about the most prominent colors you've shared in your posts throughout the year. Discover your personal or brand palette or reconnect with your most colourful experiences. Now on iOS & Android.
previous.title: Year of Colour 2020 - Find out which colours you most used on Instagram this year

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多丰富多彩？获取一份关于你全年在帖子中分享的最突出颜色的互动报告。发现您的个人或品牌调色板，或重新连接您最丰富多彩的体验。现在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的颜色

localize.description: 2020年，你的Instagram有多豐富多彩？獲取一份關於你全年在帖子中分享的最突出顏色的互動報告。發現您的個人或品牌調色板，或重新連接您最豐富多彩的體驗。現在用的是iOS和Android。
localize.tagline: 找出你今年在Instagram上最常用的顏色

next.excerpt: PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb”! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!
next.title: PictureThis 2.0 - Instantly identify plants like a botanist in your pocket 🌱

localize.description: PictureThis®每天识别1,000,000多种植物，准确率高达98%，比大多数人类专家都要好。让你的园艺问题得到解答，成为一名“园艺高手”！只需给植物拍张照片，就能为你解答所有问题！
localize.tagline: 立即识别您口袋中的植物，就像植物学家一样🌱

localize.description: PictureThis®每天識別1,000,000多種植物，準確率高達98%，比大多數人類專家都要好。讓你的園藝問題得到解答，成爲一名“園藝高手”！只需給植物拍張照片，就能爲你解答所有問題！
localize.tagline: 立即識別您口袋中的植物，就像植物學家一樣🌱
